name: TheClassicalStation
0:
”Alexa, play The Classical Station”
”Alexa, launch The Classical Station”
”Alexa, open The Classical Station”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the classical station
des:
Listen to WCPE, The Classical Station for Great Classical Music.

The Classical Station provides high quality classical music with a live announcer 24 hours every day.

To start the music, just say "Alexa, play The Classical Station".

At anytime, you can stop the music by saying "Alexa, Stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
